subsection_analysis.refined_text:
o Scramble eggs in the same pan Pajeon (Pancakes)
Ingredients:
o 1 cup flour
o 1 cup water
o 1 egg
o 1/2 cup green onions
o 1/2 cup seafood (optional)
o 1 tablespoon soy sauce
o 1 tablespoon sesame oil
Instructions:
o Mix flour, water, and beaten egg in a bowl o Add chopped green onions and seafood (if using)

o Oil for frying
Instructions:
o Mix grated cassava with coconut milk and salt o Form mixture into flat cakes Banchan
Ingredients:
o Assorted small side dishes like pickled radish, spinach, bean sprouts, kimchi
Instructions:
o Prepare each side dish separately

o Sprinkle with salt and serve warm or at room temperature Falafel
Ingredients:
o 1 can chickpeas
o 1 small onion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1/4 cup parsley
o 1 teaspoon cumin
o 1 teaspoon coriander
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/4 cup flour
o Oil for frying
Instructions:
o Drain and rinse chickpeas o Blend chickpeas, diced onion, minced garlic, chopped parsley, cumin, coriander,
and salt in a food processor

o Add diced tomatoes, fish stock, wine, saffron, thyme, salt, and pepper, simmer
for 20 minutes o Add fish fillets, shrimp, and mussels, cook until seafood is done o Serve hot with crusty bread

processor

subsection_analysis.refined_text:
o 1 small onion
o 2 tomatoes
o 1 jalape単o
o 1/4 cup cilantro
o 1 teaspoon salt
Instructions:
o Dice fish or shrimp and place in a bowl o Pour lime juice over the seafood and let marinate for 30 minutes o Dice onion, tomatoes, and jalape単o

Hummus
Ingredients:
o 1 can chickpeas
o 1/4 cup tahini
o 1/4 cup lemon juice
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1/4 cup olive oil
o 1 teaspoon salt
Instructions:
o Drain and rinse chickpeas o Blend chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, minced garlic, and salt in a food processor o Slowly add olive oil while blending until smooth

Msemen
Ingredients:
o 2 cups flour
o 1 cup semolina
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/4 cup olive oil
o 1 cup water
o 1/4 cup butter
Instructions:
o Mix flour, semolina, and salt in a bowl o Add water and knead until smooth o Blend peppers, walnuts, breadcrumbs, minced garlic, olive oil, pomegranate
molasses, cumin, and salt in a food processor until smooth.

subsection_analysis.refined_text:
Add shrimp, mussels, and cooked chicken, simmer for an additional 10 minutes until
seafood is cooked and rice is tender Garnish with lemon wedges and serve Pork Chops with Apples
Ingredients:
4 pork chops
2 apples, sliced
1 small onion, sliced
1/4 cup apple cider
1/4 cup chicken broth
2 tablespoons butter
1 tablespoon olive oil
1 teaspoon thyme
Salt and pepper to taste
Instructions:
Season pork chops with salt and pepper
